title: Gervonta Davis | Ep 50 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Gervonta Davis | Ep 50 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
Episode 50 of All The Smoke is here as boxing star Gervonta Davis joins the boys to discuss his big upcoming fight vs. Leo Santa Cruz and his relationship with Floyd Mayweather. Davis also opens up about his Baltimore roots and being compared to Mike Tyson.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
